column4: I hope they deliver a new kernel, the one I have takes so long to resume from suspend my thinkpad
which thinkpad do you have ?
t61p here, in hardy i was having the same issue. i got a new hal pushed down, and at the same time i used envy-ng to switch to the 177 driver and it fixed the issue for me
177 nvidia driver that is
uh? can you explain? what is a new hal "pushed down"??
software update
what is envy-ng? 177 driver of what?
nvidia
I do not have nvidia graphics brrr...
I have intel
hmm, maybe it was the hal that did it then
how did you install that new HAL?
although maybe hope for you. intrepid just suspended in about 5-10 seconds and resumed in 2-3 on my t61p with no issues
I'm still on the previous one
that is the name, the 'h' one
yes, hardy
that is why I hope they will upgrade the kernel in intrepid
im saying when it is released at the end of this month you might want to try it
of course I will upgrade
they did upgrade the kernel. it is 2.6.27-7 at this point, versus 2.6.24-21 in hardy
